short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid information overload with this extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an artistic extension that critiques the flood of information that we often encounter on social media. While on the Facebook website waves will slowly consume the content on the page.
